title: Episode #56: Inside NSA, Part V--An Interview with Fran Fleisch, Acting Deputy Director of NSA
itunes:title: Episode #56: Inside NSA, Part V--An Interview with Fran Fleisch, Acting Deputy Director of NSA
itunes:subtitle: In the final episode in our series, "Inside NSA: We Brought In a Recording Device So You Don't Have To," Benjamin Wittes interviews the agency's executive director--and now its acting deputy director--Fran Fleisch about openness and transparency in...
description:
In the final episode in our series, "Inside NSA: We Brought In a Recording Device So You Don't Have To," Benjamin Wittes interviews the agency's executive director--and now its acting deputy director--Fran Fleisch about openness and transparency in signals intelligence, the NSA's culture, and how the agency would respond to a major policy change from Congress.

Support this show http://supporter.acast.com/lawfare.


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
